label: SQL Server vNext on Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.2
displayName: SQL Server vNext on Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.2
description:
This image contains the Evaluation version of SQL Server vNext. This includes the restricted, in progress, version of SQL Server, licensed for development and testing only, not production. We recommend that you use a virtual machine size of DS2 or higher for development and functional testing. DS13 or higher for performance testing.
After provisioning, please run '$sudo /opt/mssql/bin/sqlservr-setup' to configure and start SQL Server.
See documentation for additional details. https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/linux/.
